Also, you can't push anything to it like an AppleTV.

review: I was on the fence as to whether to buy this or the Apple TV since I use an iPhone, iPad and Mac.  Since the ability to use my Mac with the product was not important to me, I decided to give the Fire TV a try.  I store some of my photos and slideshows on the Amazon Cloud, so they are available to view with the Fire TV and look terrific.I purchased this for our main TV when it was on sale and we were so pleased, I waited for it to go on sale again and purchased a second for another TV. It is so easy to set up and navigate.  The picture quality is excellent, better than what we get on cable.  Since purchasing, I returned our two DVRs to the cable company and downgraded our service which saved us $55 a month.  I joined Prime and I am amazed at all the wonderful free programs we can watch.  The reduction in our cable bill will cover the cost of Prime in just two months.  Although the Fire TV does not come with a Users Manual, it's so intuitive, you really don't need one.  For anyone who would like to have a manual, there is one available online that can be downloaded.The voice search feature on the remote works perfectly and makes it so easy to find just what you're looking for.Don't hesitate to buy this product.  You won't be sorry.
